text: The human <extra_id_0> interferon beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> IFN-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) regulatory element consists of multiple enhanson domains which are targets for transcription factors involved in inducible expression of the promoter .

text: To further characterize the protein - DNA interactions mediating <extra_id_0> IFN-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> induction , positive regulatory domain ( PRD ) II binding proteins were purified from phorbol ester induced Jurkat T-cells and from IFN primed , cycloheximide / polyinosinic-polycytidylic acid treated HeLa S3 cells .

text: From HeLa cells , two major proteins of 52 and 45 kilodaltons ( kD ) copurified with DNA binding activity , whereas from T-cells , four proteins -- a major protein of 52 kD and three minor proteins of 82 , 67 , and 43-47 kD -- were purified .
Also , an induction specific DNA binding protein was purified from HeLa cells that interacted with the ( AAGTGA ) 4 tetrahexamer sequence and the PRDI domain .
This protein is immunologically distinct from <extra_id_0> IRF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> ISGF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Uninduced or Sendai virus induced HeLa extracts were used to examine transcription in vitro using a series of <extra_id_0> IFN beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter deletions .
Deletions upstream of the PRDII element increased transcription in the uninduced extract , indicating predominantly negative regulation of the promoter .

A 2-4-fold increase in <extra_id_0> IFN-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter transcription was observed in Sendai virus induced extracts , and deletion of PRDI and PRDII elements decreased this induced level of transcription .

text: When purified PRDII and tetrahexamer binding proteins were added to the induced extract , a 4-fold increase in transcription was observed .

These experiments demonstrate that it is possible to modulate <extra_id_0> IFN-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcription in vitro but indicate that additional proteins may be required to fully activate <extra_id_0> IFN-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcription .
